column4: hey, i just installed 7.04 on my laptop. I have an nvidia graphic card yet when i run the restricted driver utility it says that my hardware does not need any restricted drivers... any ideas?
what graphics card are you using?

i had problems with my 6600 geforce, the best thing to do is to go straight to the nvidia site, download the drivers and compile them yourself, it will do pretty much everything for you and itl run fine
